## Key points

1.  There are multiple approaches to customizing Synthea data, and the best approach depends on the specifics of your use case
2.  One option is to post-process the data generated by Synthea with standard data manipulation tools (e.g. a Python script)
3.  Another option is to create a custom data generation module in Synthea's Java codebase
